name: mri_mc
description: Extract a surface from a label volume using Marching Cubes algorithm.

inputs.name: Input Volume
inputs.description: The input volume from which to extract the surface.

inputs.name: Label Value
inputs.description: The label value of the structure to extract.

inputs.name: Output Surface
inputs.description: The file where the extracted surface mesh will be saved.

inputs.name: Connectivity
inputs.description: The connectivity used for Marching Cubes. Options are: 1=6+, 2=18, 3=6, 4=26.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
